org.influxdata.platform

Interface PlatformClientReactive

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlatformClientReactiveImpl

    public interface PlatformClientReactive
extends AutoCloseable
    The reference RxJava client for the Influx 2.0 OSS Platform that allows query and write in a reactive way.
    Author:
    Jakub Bednar (bednar@github) (20/11/2018 07:08)

        Returns:

      • enableGzip

        @Nonnull
PlatformClientReactive enableGzip()
        Enable Gzip compress for http request body. Currently only the "Write" endpoint supports the Gzip compression.
        Returns:
        the PlatformClient instance to be able to use it in a fluent manner.

      • disableGzip

        @Nonnull
PlatformClientReactive disableGzip()
        Disable Gzip compress for http request body.
        Returns:
        the PlatformClient instance to be able to use it in a fluent manner.

      • isGzipEnabled

        boolean isGzipEnabled()
        Returns whether Gzip compress for http request body is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if gzip is enabled.
